definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Sven Hedin (1865-1952), famous Swedish adventurer and archaeologist, whose 1894-1900 Central Asian expeditions uncovered Kroraina or Loulan 樓蘭|楼兰[Lou2 lan2]/also written 斯文·赫定
Sven Hedin (1865-1952), famous Swedish adventurer and archaeologist, whose 1894-1900 Central Asian expeditions uncovered Kroraina or Loulan 樓蘭|楼兰

sentences.english: As far as I know, none has been translated.
sentences.chinese: 据我所知，我的作品还没有波斯文译本。

sentences.english: As he, Sven, warm heart, and her most loving words do not.
sentences.chinese: 就象他，斯文，暖心，还有她最爱的不言的默契。

sentences.english: We are manufacturing what supplies the safety, " Swenson said.
sentences.chinese: 我们生产安全的食品用品”斯文森说。

sentences.english: In fact, it is the Persian word for pitch.
sentences.chinese: 现实上，这是个用来暗示沥青的波斯文词语。

sentences.english: An inexpensive cavalry unit, useful for supplementing more expensive knights.
sentences.chinese: 斯文纳骑兵战力较弱，多与精锐骑士共同出战。

sentences.english: His job is just to dispense ARV drugs from the local Empilisweni hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作是在安培斯文尼当地的医院分发抗病毒药物。

sentences.english: Along with other Swensen varieties, it is an important varietal in the northern United States.
sentences.chinese: 随着其他斯文森品种，它是在美国北部的重要品种。

sentences.english: Swenson Model 64 cutting BlueScope corrugated panel.
sentences.chinese: 斯文森64型切割博思格瓦楞纸板。

sentences.english: On Friday, Facebook announced it is making its Web site available in the Farsi language.
sentences.chinese: 周五，非死不可宣布他正在制作波斯文网站。

sentences.english: Kristoff rides Sven as they follow the trail of ice.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯托弗骑着斯文，沿着冰形成的尾迹跟随着他们。

sentences.english: Li said he was the most gentle, Tang Hao smiled.
sentences.chinese: 黎说他最斯文，汤豪笑了。

sentences.english: Come and visit Your good friend Sweeney — !
sentences.chinese: 过来看看你的好朋友斯文尼吧。

sentences.english: Well, your school is too refined to speak of napalm.
sentences.chinese: 那么，你的学校是太斯文可言凝固汽油弹。

sentences.english: The distinction between poetry and drama is implicit in the view of Swinburne.
sentences.chinese: 诗歌与戏剧之区别包含在斯文本的见解之中。

sentences.english: She is sitting there so civilized, without saying a word.
sentences.chinese: 她斯斯文文地坐在那里，一句话也不说。

definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
(of a person's manner or character) gentle and quiet
the impact of a piece of writing on the reader/gentle/refined
